==== Ubuntu Women Team ====
* Flavia Weisghizzi and Silvia Bindelli of Ubuntu-It spoke with Debian and Fedora women at the Debian Ubuntu (Italian) Community Conference
** <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-women/2010-September/003008.html|Mailing list post]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[http://xdatap1.wordpress.com/2010/09/21/debian-ubuntu-community-conference-ita-2010/|blog]]</nowiki> (w/ photos!)
* Melissa Draper and Alan Bell have been working on new wiki theme for our website
** <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/~ubuntu-women/ubuntu-women.org/mointheme]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://fullcirclemagazine.org/issue-41/|Full Circle Magazine, Issue #41]]</nowiki> with interview of 10.10 Kernel Release Manager Leann Ogasawara
* Team update (in lieu of meeting) <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-women/2010-September/003016.html|September 23rd]]</nowiki>
* Team meeting <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/Meetings/20100908|September 8th]]</nowiki>
* Laura Czajkowski ran her 4th Barcamp in Dublin <nowiki>[[http://ossbarcamp.com|ossbarcamp]]</nowiki>
* Isabell Long's Rewired State project <nowiki>[[http://www.number10.gov.uk/news/topstorynews/2010/09/pm-challenges-departments-to-slash-energy-use-55332|hits the headlines]]</nowiki> http://govspark.org.uk/about/
* Of the 623 Ubuntu Members at the end of this month 4.82% are women
